name: F.A. City Grand Prix
text: Increase the Levels of all "F.A." monsters on the field by 2 during the Main Phase and Battle Phase. Your opponent cannot target "F.A." monsters you control with card effects. If this face-up card on the field is destroyed by a card effect: You can add 1 "F.A." card from your Deck to your hand, except "F.A. City Grand Prix". You can only use this effect of "F.A. City Grand Prix" once per turn.
